sourcesContent:
export function getOxfordCommaList(items: string[]): string {
  return items
    .map(
      (v, index, { length }) =>
        (index > 0
          ? index === length - 1
            ? length > 2
              ? ', and '
              : ' and '
            : ', '
          : '') + v
    )
    .join('')
}
